courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: GE 320.
description: Mechatronics concepts and practice: computer interfacing of physical devices (sensors, actuators); data acquisition; real time programming and real time control; human-machine interfaces; design principles of mechatronics in manufacturing systems and in consumer systems. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: GE 320.
label: Mechatronics
